pullrequest.title: Fix Same File Error by change log likelihood filename.

content.raw:
done.

I add a bunch of updated file in a recent commit from test folder since the change in the code will also affect the details.sh file of the run as this includes the path to the likelihood file.
Also the final .tab file need to change to the current name to pass the test.
content.html:
done.

I add a bunch of updated file in a recent commit from test folder since the change in the code will also affect the details.sh file of the run as this includes the path to the likelihood file. Also the final .tab file need to change to the current name to pass the test.
